extension.summary: Forward XBMC events to an AVR Control server
extension.description: This addon will intercept XBMC events (such as key presses or other events) and convert them into AVR control commands being sent to the AVR Controller listening at /tmp/avr_control.
extension.disclaimer: Depends on keymap configuration to trigger this script with event arguments which will be converted into AVR commands by this script. Also depends on an AVR Controller listening on /tmp/avr_control.
